DOC.brief_summary: Although author observe favorable effect group physical activity program , others report individualized prescription exercise may jeopardize program allow sufficient consideration individual characteristic . Therefore , aim verify effect elderly-specific multimodal physical activity program physical parameter one year intervention .
DOC.criteria: Participate Geriatric Revitalization Program one year Be wait list Geriatric Revitalization Program Attend less 75 % physical activity program 's activity Absent three followup physical parameter evaluation
